H0.text: Eye color is a trait that a child can inherit from its parents.

H1.text: A broken leg is a trait that a child can inherit from its parents.

H2.text: Length of hair is a trait that a child can inherit from its parents.

H3.text: Language skills are a trait that a child can inherit from its parents.

A4.text: Eye color is an inherited trait determined by multiple genes.
